NCSM.title: New College Social Media
NCSM.desc: NCSM is an app being developed by a group of students at NAU. NCSM is a multipurpose app that is meant to bring students on campus together. This app will improve the college experience for students that struggle to connect with others.

OSS.title: Operating System Simulator
OSS.desc: Operating System Simulator project that was completed over the course of a semester. Consists of 4 parts that continue to implement different schedules and features of an operating system.

Ceres.title: Ceres
Ceres.desc: Full stack web application that provides NAU researchers with a GUI to view asteroid observations from the Zwicky Transient Facility.

CP.title: Capture Portfolio
CP.desc: Tutorial I followed that was created by DevByEd to help learn ReactJS and other web development skils

TPR.title: The Potted Roots
TPR.desc: Plant Shop website created for a local business I am looking to start that sells rare and unique indoor house plants.
